description:
This course is all about goal setting. Do you have something that you want to achieve? This course will take you through an easy and quick goal setting process that will help achieve more.

You will be taken through a series of exercises that are geared to towards helping you developing a well structured personal goals that you will be mean more to you.

Quick and Easy Goal Setting includes an accompanying Ebook booklet that with all of the exercises in it. The booklet is your guide through the course and will allow you to record all of those important goals and steps to working towards achieving.

The course will be made up of video's and presentations for you ease and enjoy. Each lecture will explain how the exercises works and will guide you through how you get them most of it.

We all have things we want to achieve in our personal lives and professional lives. The reason why most of us do not achieve the things we want is because they do not have a plan. Quick and Easy Goal Setting helps you create that plan and most important of all helps you stick to it.

I hope you enjoy this course and you achieve you that you desire from it.
title: Goal Setting Made Simple
